title: (x) The University of Texas at Arlington - ITC Benguiat {Grant}
content:
![Press Box Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109092823im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22346.jpg)   
   
I know I've seen this font before. Any help would be appreciated.
author: ardecila

comments.content: Since when do 'Fontaholics' have a normal life? And some of us are married too, and party closer to the computer ;-)

\> _Frankly Grant, what on earth were you doing at your computer on a_   
\> _Saturday night at 8:55 pm? Saturday night's for partying, yaknow!_   
   
If you must know, it was actually closer to 10 pm our time, and we had just finished putting the kids to bed _after_ partying down the street with the nieghbors. So there. One last type ID before a nightcap.   
   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109092823im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
